description:
Flint`s Chimchar was seen during a flashback sequence which explained how Flint and Volkner first met. As a young trainer, Flint often challenged trainers with his Chimchar which was very strong.
Flint`s Chimchar managed to defeat Volkner`s Pikachu in their first meeting in an alleyway, but was finally defeated in a future rematch battle between the two.
name: Hikozaru (Ooba)
